scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a violent act within an architectural setting. In the foreground, a figure with long hair, possibly female, is kneeling or lying down, with another figure bending over them, appearing to be in the act of beheading. Behind them, a group of men, some wearing hats and tunics, and one with a beard, stand with swords. One man points towards the kneeling figure. The background suggests an urban environment with buildings and arched architectural elements.
scene_interpretation: Martyrdom of Saint John the Baptist
